Abduct.name: 劫持
Abduct.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动一名正被其擒抱的生物时无需额外消耗移动力。

Aberrant Ground.name: 异变丛生
Aberrant Ground.description: 源自 [[lookup @name]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zVznqPXgYjETqpQz]] 尺光环区域内的地面视为 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]。

Absorb Body.name: 吞吃躯体
Absorb Body.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 5 feet.

Failure: The target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space and becomes grafted to its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one target grafted at a time.

While grafted, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and Disadvantage on Constitution saving throws. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the grafted target moves with it. If [[lookup @activation.condition activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]], its body is destroyed, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]] Hit Points.

The grafted target or a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@abilities.str.dc format=long]]. On a successful check, the target is no longer grafted and moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

heal.condition: 若目标在被嫁接期间死亡

Grafted: Con Saves and Restrained.name: 陷入束缚状态且进行体质豁。
Grafted: Con Saves and Restrained.description:
被嫁接期间，目标陷入束缚 状态且其进行的体质豁免具有劣势。

被嫁接目标自身或位于尸聚怪5尺内的生物，都能够以动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]] (DC值参考源物品)。 检定成功则目标不再被嫁接，并移动至尸聚怪5尺内的一处未占据空间。

Acid Absorption.name: 强酸吸收
Acid Absorption.description: 每当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 受到 &Reference[Acid] 伤害，其不受伤害，改为恢复等于强酸伤害数值的生命值。

Acid Absorption.name: 强酸吸收
Acid Absorption.description: 该生物免疫强酸伤害，改为恢复等于强酸伤害数值的生命值

Acid Breath.name: 强酸吐息
Acid Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] 尺长、[[lookup @target.template.width activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] 尺宽的线状区域内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害。

成功：半伤。

Acid Spray.name: 酸液喷射
Acid Spray.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] 尺长， [[lookup @target.template.width activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] 尺宽的线状区域内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Adhesive (Object Form Only).name: 粘附（仅物件形态）
Adhesive (Object Form Only).description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 粘附在任何触碰到其的东西上。体型不超过巨型的被粘附生物陷入&Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。为逃脱此擒抱进行的属性检定具有劣势。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]，请查看源条目以获取DC）。为逃脱此擒抱进行的属性检定具有劣势。

Advanced Telepathy.name: 增强心灵感应
Advanced Telepathy.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以感知到其60尺内的任何心灵感应交流的内容。

Aim.name: 瞄准
Aim.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 令其在当前回合中进行的下次攻击检定具有优势。

Air Form.name: 空气形态
Air Form.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以进入并停留在一名生物所处的空间。其可以移动穿过最窄1寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Amorphous.name: 无定形
Amorphous.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Animal Lordship.name: 万兽之主
Animal Lordship.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 代表着觅兽、猎兽、睿兽中的一种（由DM选择），这会决定数据卡中的特定特质。

造型表 Appearance Tables

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmForagerAnimalL rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{觅兽之兽主造型}

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmHunterAnimalLo rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{猎兽之兽主造型}

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmSageAnimalLord rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{睿兽之兽主造型}

Animal Spirit.name: 兽灵之力
Animal Spirit.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 咒唤一道兽之灵体，其将袭向一个生物并随即消失。

敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cx21u9ZYjSdu2m3U]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=cx21u9ZYjSdu2m3U]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见的生物。失败： [[/damage average]]伤害。成功： 半伤。失败或成功： 出现以下一道效应：

卫戍之力（仅觅兽）。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 获得 [[lookup @healing.formula activity=emHqEek8e9Mwyaj7]] 临时生命值。

标定猎物 Marked as Prey（仅猎兽）。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 对目标发动的攻击检定具有优势，直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

恼人兽群（仅睿兽）。目标在攻击检定和属性检定上具有劣势，直至其下一回合结束。

Hunter: Marked as Prey.name: 猎兽：标定猎物
Hunter: Marked as Prey.description: 兽主对你发动的攻击检定具有优势，直至兽主的下一回合开始。

Sage: Pesky Swarm.name: 睿兽：恼人兽群
Sage: Pesky Swarm.description: 你在攻击检定和属性检定上具有劣势，直至下一回合结束。

Animate Boulders.name: 活化石头
Animate Boulders.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] animates [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] feet of itself. Each boulder uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGalebDuhr00000] stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1 and lacks this action. The boulder takes its turn immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. A boulder remains animate for [[lookup @duration.value activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] minute or until it or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

Antennae.name: 触角
Antennae.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] object—armor or a weapon—worn or carried by a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] feet of itself. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]], the creature with the object. Failure: The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000] spell on the armor or weapon.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides a Damaged Enchantment effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that the equipment penalty can be applied multiple times, the enchantment needs to be dragged from this item's Effects tab onto the target Item's sheet.

Damaged: -1 AC/Attack.name: 伤害：护甲等级或攻击检定获得-1减值
Damaged: -1 AC/Attack.description: 物件提供的AC（护甲）或进行的攻击检定（武器）获得-1减值。护甲AC降至10、武器减值达到-5时，物件被摧毁。 。对护甲和武器施展法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000] 可以移除该减值。

Antimagic Cone.name: 反魔法锥域
Antimagic Cone.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s central eye emits an antimagic wave in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]] [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]]. Until the start of the beholder’s next turn, that area acts as an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAntimagicF] spell, and that area works against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s own Eye Rays.

Aquatic Burst.name: 洋流冲刷
Aquatic Burst.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[倒地] 状态。

Aquatic Charge.name: 水下冲锋
Aquatic Charge.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 向一名其可见的敌人直线游动至多等于其游泳速度的距离。

Arcane Prowl.name: 奥术潜步
Arcane Prowl.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport up to [[lookup @range.value activity=a3RqyzU0UqzLJif0]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one [[/item Claw]] attack.

Arcane Tentacles.name: Arcane Tentacles
Arcane Tentacles.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport the target up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see on a surface or liquid large enough to support the target. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills it and magically devours its brain.

Astral Implosion.name: Astral Implosion
Astral Implosion.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it implodes and ejects any creatures and objects engulfed by it into the Astral Sea. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] itself vanishes, leaving behind a layer of slime on everything that was within 600 feet of it. In [[/r 1d20#Years]] years, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reconstitutes on a random world in the Material Plane.

Attach.name: 吸附
Attach.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to it. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Bite attacks against other targets. In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by spending 5 feet of movement. The target or a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] feet of it can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]], doing so by succeeding on a DC [[lookup @check.dc.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] Strength (Athletics) check.

Detach Attempt.name: Detach Attempt
Detach Attempt.condition: Action taken by the target or creature within range of it

Attached: Blinded.name: Attached: Blinded
Attached: Blinded.description: While attached, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition.

Aura of Authority.name: Aura of Authority
Aura of Authority.description: While in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dE4lg9tZyXtoCb5x]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its allies have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Aura of Bravery.name: Aura of Bravery
Aura of Bravery.description: Creatures of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=N8uK4xdPCXdknRTb]]-foot Emanation originating from it have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions while there.

Charmed & Frightened.name: Charmed & Frightened
Charmed & Frightened.description: Targets have immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions while there.

Avalanche Slam.name: Avalanche Slam
Avalanche Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=M8ntOH8iSnEUaYhj]] creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=M8ntOH8iSnEUaYhj]] straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage and has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Aversion to Fire.name: Aversion to Fire
Aversion to Fire.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Averse.name: Averse
Averse.description: It has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Avoidance.name: Avoidance
Avoidance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and half damage if it fails. It can’t use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

Awestruck.name: Awestruck
Awestruck.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Baleful Command.name: Baleful Command
Baleful Command.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] and &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Frightened & Incapacitated.name: Frightened & Incapacitated
Frightened & Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] and &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] conditions until the start of the user's next turn.

Banish.name: Banish
Banish.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is transported to a harmless demiplane until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, at which point it re­appears in an unoccupied space of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again [[lookup @duration.special activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]].

Banished: Incapacitated.name: Banished: Incapacitated
Banished: Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is transported to a harmless demiplane until the start of the user's next turn, at which point it re­appears in an unoccupied space of the user's choice within range of the user.

Banishing Claw.name: Banishing Claw
Banishing Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zTrsaQFwVagWU19h]].

Failure: The target is trapped in a demiplane inside the Soul Tome. While trapped there, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=cha]] save, escaping the tome on a success. When the target escapes, it appears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, the nearest unoccupied space.

If the target fails three of these saves while in the demiplane, it becomes bound to the tome and can escape only if the tome is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Hit: Creature.name: Hit: Creature
Hit: Creature.condition: hits a creature with the attack

Trapped: Incapacitated.name: Trapped: Incapacitated
Trapped: Incapacitated.description: The target is trapped in a demiplane inside the Soul Tome. While trapped there, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=cha]] save, escaping the tome on a success. When the target escapes, it appears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, the nearest unoccupied space.

Barbed Hide.name: Barbed Hide
Barbed Hide.description: At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage to any creature [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1O5eyc72vPW0UxYZ]].

damage.condition: start of each of its turns

Beaks.name: Beaks
Beaks.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]] if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]]

Beard.name: Beard
Beard.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the user's next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Beast of Burden.name: 驼兽
Beast of Burden.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] counts as one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

Beguile.name: Beguile
Beguile.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Beguiling Song.name: Beguiling Song
Beguiling Song.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=rbe2FvPTepUsO4GL]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=rbe2FvPTepUsO4GL]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=rbe2FvPTepUsO4GL]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Beguiling Strike.name: Beguiling Strike
Beguiling Strike.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Charmed.name: Charmed
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the user's next turn.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description:
Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn &Reference[Bloodied], roll [[/r 1d6]]. On a 6, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks an object. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s creator, if within [[lookup @range.value activity=tnkOsrSwEElO2kZM]] feet of the berserk [[lookup @name lowercase]], can try to calm it by taking an action to make a [[/check ability=cha skill=per dc=@abilities.str.dc]] DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check; the golem must be able to hear its creator. If this check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk until the start of its next turn, at which point it resumes rolling for the Berserk trait again if it is still Bloodied.

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.description: On each of its turns while berserk, the creature attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the creature attacks an object. Once the creature goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer &Reference[Bloodied apply=false].

Bites.name: Bites
Bites.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]] if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]]

Blazing Light.name: Blazing Light
Blazing Light.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast [[/item Scorching Ray]]

Blazing Movement.name: Blazing Movement
Blazing Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]. During this movement, fire fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=MUbX28KmoDF9sC5b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. When the Emanation enters a creature’s space, that creature takes [[/damage average]] damage. A creature [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=MUbX28KmoDF9sC5b]].

Blight Seeds.name: Blight Seeds
Blight Seeds.description:
When it finishes a Long Rest, the blight expels [[/r 1d6#Seeds expelled]] seeds into unoccupied spaces on the ground within 30 feet of itself. After 24 hours, the seeds become creatures under the blight’s control. Roll 1d8 for each seed to determine the creature it becomes:

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmBlightSeedCrea rollable classes="caption-top"]

Blinding Breath.name: Blinding Breath
Blinding Breath.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]]-foot Cone. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the user's next turn.

Blinding Flash.name: Blinding Flash
Blinding Flash.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description: the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the user’s next turn.

Blinding Gaze.name: Blinding Gaze
Blinding Gaze.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition for 1 minute. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Blinding Spittle.name: Blinding Spittle
Blinding Spittle.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Blinded.name: Blinded
Blinded.description: the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the user’s next turn.

Blood Frenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
Blood Frenzy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that doesn’t have all its Hit Points.

Bloodied Frenzy.name: Bloodied Frenzy
Bloodied Frenzy.description: While &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

Cataclysmic Event.name: Cataclysmic Event
Cataclysmic Event.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates one of the following effects at random (roll [[/r 1d4#Cataclysmic Event]]):

1: Clinging Flames. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]] damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: The target starts &Reference[burning].

2: Freezing Waves. Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]]-foot Cone. Failure: [[/damage average activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only. Failure or Success: The target’s Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn.

3: Raging Storm. A storm cloud fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]] feet. The cloud lasts for 1 minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Cataclysmic Event again. Creatures entirely in the cloud have the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Deafened apply=false] conditions and can’t cast spells with a Verbal component. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]], each creature that enters the cloud for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. Failure: [[/damage average activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]] damage. Success: Half damage.

4: Swallowing Earth. Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]]-foot Cube originating from a point on the ground within [[lookup @range.value activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition and is buried under rubble. A buried target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, has &Reference[Total Cover], and is &Reference[suffocating]. As an action, a buried creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]]. On a successful check, the creature is no longer buried. Success: Half damage only.

Corrosive Form.name: Corrosive Form

A creature that hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack roll takes [[/damage average]] damage. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches −5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the weapon.

In 1 minute, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can eat through 2 feet of nonmagical wood or metal.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Attack Penalty active effect that will modify a targeted weapon. Since this penalty can be applied multiple times to multiple nonmagical weapons, this active effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target Item's weapons.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

Create Whirlwind.name: Create Whirlwind

The whirlwind fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-high [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] centered on that point. The whirlwind lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Concentration on it ends. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move the whirlwind up to 20 feet at the start of each of its turns.

Whenever the whirlwind enters a creature’s space or a creature enters the whirlwind, that creature is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] (a creature makes this save only once per turn, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected).

Failure: While in the whirlwind, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and moves with the whirlwind. At the start of each of its turns, the Restrained target takes [[/damage average]] damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Restrained.name: Restrained

The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and moves with the whirlwind.

At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. A creature can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] from itself, doing so with a successful [[/check format=long]]. On its turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by using 5 feet of movement.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed and can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures and objects.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]], each creature or object whose space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters for the first time during this move.

Failure: The target is engulfed. While engulfed, a target has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the engulfed target moves with it. A nonmagical object is destroyed after spending 1 minute engulfed.

While engulfed, a creature takes [[/damage average activity=Exfa4q7O4SvXjGt7]] damage at the start of each of its turns, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, has the &Reference[Restrained apply=long] condition, and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. An engulfed creature that is reduced to 0 Hit Points dissolves into ash, which is ejected into the Astral Sea.

Success: The target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained.name: Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained
Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained.description: At the start of each of its turns, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, has the &Reference[Restrained apply=long] condition, and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns.

Entangling Plants.name: Entangling Plants
Entangling Plants.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00] spell, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.con.dc]]).

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Ethereal Jaunt.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa.

Ethereal Sight.name: Ethereal Sight
Ethereal Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane.

Ethereal Stride.name: Ethereal Stride
Ethereal Stride.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and up to [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] [[lookup @range.units activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]]. of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness} spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but it can’t affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

Euphoria Breath.name: Euphoria Breath
Euphoria Breath.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]], it succeeds automatically. While Incapacitated, the target uses all its movement on each of its turns to move in a random direction.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can’t use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

Exalted Restoration.name: Exalted Restoration
Exalted Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

Extract Brain.name: Extract Brain
Extract Brain.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] that is Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Tentacles. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] damage. Failure or Success: If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills it and devours its brain.

Eye Rays.name: Eye Rays
Eye Rays.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll [[/r 1d10]]; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn):

Eye Rays

1: Charm Ray. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] or until it takes damage. Success: Half damage only.

2: Paralyzing Ray. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]], it succeeds automatically.

3: Fear Ray. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

4: Slowing Ray. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]] damage. Until the end of the target’s next turn, the target’s Speed is halved; the target can’t take &Reference[Reaction]{Reactions}; and it can take either an action or a &Reference[BonusAction] on its turn, not both. Success: Half damage only.

5: Enervation Ray. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points. Success: Half damage only.

6: Telekinetic Ray. Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]] (the target succeeds automatically if it is Gargantuan). Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves the target up to [[lookup @target.template.size activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]]. in any direction. The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn or until the beholder has the Incapacitated condition. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a tool or opening a door or container.

7: Sleep Ray. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]] (the target succeeds automatically if it is a Construct or an Undead). Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]]. The condition ends if the target takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

8: Petrification Ray. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=q67AgIfRplRO2e9p]]. First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

9: Disintegration Ray. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]] damage. If the target is a nonmagical object or a creation of magical force, a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]] of it disintegrates into dust. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: If the target is a creature and this damage reduces it to 0 Hit Points, it disintegrates into dust.

10: Death Ray. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]] damage. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]] damage. Failure or Success: The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 Hit Points.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ovXNUYiRFsNC9lFh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ovXNUYiRFsNC9lFh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ovXNUYiRFsNC9lFh]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Charming. The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=mOFKBLSi65tp5u3i]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=mOFKBLSi65tp5u3i]]. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and uses all its movement to dance in place. The effect ends on the target if it takes any damage.

Frightening. [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=ib78HezKRQ8jxfKz]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=ib78HezKRQ8jxfKz]]. If the target ends its turn out of line of sight from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the condition ends on it.

While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and uses all its movement to dance in place.

While cursed, the target can’t benefit from the Invisible condition, its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and all Fiends within 120 feet of the target can sense its location regardless of interposing obstacles.

Fire Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so, and it can enter a creature’s space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature’s space on a turn, that creature takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=kBpDyPr5UXlJsigT]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=kBpDyPr5UXlJsigT]].

Flame Aura.description: At the end of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turns, each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=f4cPafTT2VXHbpr7]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Flame Spear.name: Flame Spear
Flame Spear.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Flame Trident.name: Flame Trident
Flame Trident.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Hit or Miss: The trident magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Flame Whip.name: Flame Whip
Flame Whip.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls the target up to 25 feet straight toward itself, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

attack.chatFlavor: On Hit: Huge or smaller creatures pulled 25 ft. toward attacking creature.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Flash of Light.name: Flash of Light
Flash of Light.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Attacks: Disadvantage.name: Attacks: Disadvantage
Attacks: Disadvantage.description: The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] throws a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]] Grappled by it to a space it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]] feet of itself [[lookup @range.special activity=E7YKnUIWsavrnNzK]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage.

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Fog Cloud.name: 云雾术
Fog Cloud.description: The mephit casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

Forbiddance.name: 禁入

Freezing Burst.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=U2i9u4ELjeLQfePP]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=U2i9u4ELjeLQfePP]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见一点为源点半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=U2i9u4ELjeLQfePP]] 尺球状区域内的每个生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标的速度降至 0，直至该目标的下一回合结束。

成功：此后 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 不能再执行此动作，直至其下一回合开始。

0 ft. Speed.name: 速度归零

Frenzied Rush.name: 狂怒冲杀

Frightening.name: 恐慌之音

If the target ends its turn out of line of sight from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the condition ends on it.

Frightful Presence.name: 骇人威仪

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] babbles incoherently while it doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=PyGOI84k0PPYrru8]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=PyGOI84k0PPYrru8]] that starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=PyGOI84k0PPYrru8]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while it is babbling. Failure: The target rolls [[/r 1d8]] to determine what it does during the current turn:

1–4. The target does nothing.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The target makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can’t make such an attack.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target rolls [[/r 1d6]] whenever it makes an ability check or attack roll and subtracts the number rolled from the D20 Test.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Giggling.name: Giggling
Giggling.description: Until the end of its next turn, the target rolls [[/r 1d6]] whenever it makes an ability check or attack and subtracts the number rolled from the D20 Test.

Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直到报丧妖的下一回合开始。

Hunger of Hadar.name: Hunger of Hadar
Hunger of Hadar.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHungerofHa]{Hunger of Hadar} (level 5 version), requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).

Hunger of Yeenoghu.name: Hunger of Yeenoghu
Hunger of Yeenoghu.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] of magical Darkness originating from a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] [[lookup @range.units activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]]., which lasts for [[lookup @duration.value activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s &Reference[Concentration] ends on it. This area is &Reference[DifficultTerrain].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] that starts its turn in this area or enters it for the first time on a turn.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or a creature of its choice it can see gains [[/healing activity=DXSz02tEbmOq9fOu]] Hit Points.

Success: Half damage.

Hurl Flame.name: Hurl Flame
Hurl Flame.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a flammable object that isn’t being worn or carried, it starts burning.

Hypnotic Gaze.name: Hypnotic Gaze
Hypnotic Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Hypnotic Gaze for 24 hours.

Stunned.name: Stunned
Stunned.description: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Ice Spear.name: Ice Spear
Ice Spear.description:
[[/attack extended]].

Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target can’t take a &Reference[Bonus Action] or &Reference[Reaction], its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and it can move or take one action on its turn, not both.

Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Speed -10.name: Speed -10
Speed -10.description: Until the end of its next turn, the target's speed decreases by 10 feet.

Ice Walk.name: Ice Walk
Ice Walk.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, &Reference[Difficult Terrain] composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost it extra movement.

Ice Wall.name: Ice Wall
Ice Wall.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{Wall of Ice} (level 8 version), requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]).

Icy Bite.name: Icy Bite
Icy Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Speed: -5 ft..name: Speed: -5 ft.
Speed: -5 ft..description: The target’s Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Ignited Illumination.name: Ignited Illumination
Ignited Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sets itself ablaze or extinguishes its flames. While ablaze, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a {m}-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional {n} feet.

Illusory Appearance.name: Illusory Appearance
Illusory Appearance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]). The spell’s duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]]s.

Incite Rampage.name: Incite Rampage
Incite Rampage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets another [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]] feet of itself [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]]. The target can take a &Reference[Reaction] to make one melee attack.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Incubus Form.name: Incubus Form
Incubus Form.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmIncubus0000000]{Incubus}, using that stat block instead of this one.

Infernal Glaive.name: Infernal Glaive
Infernal Glaive.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature and doesn’t already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=4qy3fKL086OAE1xR]]. Failure: The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=IS4utGV80LpDrjvt]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check format=long activity=KNWa0TFhANjmQCds]].

Infernal Sting.name: Infernal Sting
Infernal Sting.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Infernal Tail.name: Infernal Tail
Infernal Tail.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @range.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] damage, and the target receives an infernal wound if it doesn’t have one. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=zZfCQ0IeJZCjPLzE]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after [[lookup @duration.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check dc=17 ability=wis skill=med format=long]].

Inferno Blast.name: Inferno Blast
Inferno Blast.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]-radius [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] [[lookup @range.units activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] damage, and the target starts burning, taking [[/damage average activity=cuIDOQ2o3dMRhqzd]] damage at the start of each of its turns instead of the normal burning damage. The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level whenever it takes this burning damage.

Success: Half damage only.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that effect can be applied multiple times, the effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target item's sheet each time the target gains a level of exhaustion after the initial level is applied.

Exhaustion.name: Exhaustion
Exhaustion.description: The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level whenever it takes this burning damage.

Injecting Claw.name: Injecting Claw
Injecting Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a [[lookup @name lowercase]], it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C5wp4BSKfYlbMurm]]. Failure: The target is cursed unawares, and a minuscule slaad egg is implanted in it. Removing the curse destroys the egg.

Over [[/r 2d4*10#Days egg gestates]]{2d4 × 10} days, the egg gestates. In the final 24 hours, the cursed target feels unwell; its Speed is halved, and it has Disadvantage on D20 Tests. At the end of this time, the egg turns into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSlaadTadpole00]{Slaad Tadpole}, which chews out of the host and kills it.

Ink Cloud.name: Ink Cloud
Ink Cloud.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage while underwater.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases ink that fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1MiIPcVuCpfgBIkS]]-foot Cube centered on itself, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

Blinded: Heavily Obscured.name: Blinded: Heavily Obscured
Blinded: Heavily Obscured.description: You have the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition while trying to see something in a Heavily Obscured space.

Inscrutable.name: Inscrutable
Inscrutable.description: No magic can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

Invisible in Water.name: Invisible in Water
Invisible in Water.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Invisible] condition while fully immersed in water.

Invitation.name: Invitation
Invitation.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC 17, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target is teleported inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space and swallowed. A swallowed [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Hit Points, a swallowed [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] can leave the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the Plane Shift spell.

Total Cover.name: Total Cover
Total Cover.description: A swallowed creature has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the revenant.

Iron Scent.name: Iron Scent
Iron Scent.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] feet of itself.

Jinx.name: Jinx
Jinx.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see hits it with an attack roll.

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=02KFzL9fElzyHOIT]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack misses instead.

Save.name: Save
Save.condition: A creature the goblin can see hits it with an attack roll.

Jumper.name: Jumper
Jumper.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s jump distance is determined using its Dexterity rather than its Strength.

Lash.name: Lash
Lash.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Tentacle attack.

Lashing Goop.name: Lashing Goop
Lashing Goop.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Pseudopod attack.

Leap.name: Leap
Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

Legendary Resistance.name: Legendary Resistance
Legendary Resistance.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Life Drain.name: Life Drain
Life Drain.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

Life Suppression.name: Life Suppression
Life Suppression.description: Creatures within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=n7LC7M3BMXe8n2Ro]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t regain Hit Points.

Life-Draining Root.name: Life-Draining Root
Life-Draining Root.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] [[lookup @range.units activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and takes [[/damage average activity=y8c5uBc58T7dKgQf]] damage at the start of each of its turns. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Target: Grappled & Restrained.name: Target: Grappled & Restrained
Target: Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition.

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition.

Light Sensitivity.name: Light Sensitivity
Light Sensitivity.description: While in Bright Light, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

Lightning Absorption.name: Lightning Absorption
Lightning Absorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

Lightning Blade.name: Lightning Blade
Lightning Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target can’t take &Reference[Reaction] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Lightning Breath.name: Lightning Breath
Lightning Breath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Lightning Storm.name: Lightning Storm
Lightning Storm.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-feet-high Cylinder originating from a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success:Half damage.

Limited Amphibiousness.name: Limited Amphibiousness
Limited Amphibiousness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water, but it must be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating outside water.

Limited Foresight.name: Limited Foresight
Limited Foresight.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see makes an attack roll against it.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] imposes Disadvantage on the roll, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Expend Use.name: Expend Use
Expend Use.condition: A creature the cyclops can see makes an attack roll against it.

Living Shadow.name: 活体幽影
Living Shadow.description:
While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab. The resistances outlined will need to be manually enabled/disabled.

Acid Resistance.name: Acid Resistance
Acid Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Bludgeoning Resistance.name: Bludgeoning Resistance
Bludgeoning Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Cold Resistance.name: Cold Resistance
Cold Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Fire Resistance.name: Fire Resistance
Fire Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Lightning Resistance.name: Lightning Resistance
Lightning Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Necrotic Resistance.name: Necrotic Resistance
Necrotic Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Piercing Resistance.name: Piercing Resistance
Piercing Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Poison Resistance.name: Poison Resistance
Poison Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Slashing Resistance.name: Slashing Resistance
Slashing Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Thunder Resistance.name: Thunder Resistance
Thunder Resistance.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the creature has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Loathsome Limbs.name: Loathsome Limbs
Loathsome Limbs.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]l’s limbs is severed, falls into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space, and becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmTrollLimb00000]{Troll Limb}. The limb acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect condition in the character sheet's Effects tab to enable each level of Exhaustion. Since the condition can be applied multiple times, the GM must manually manage the level of Exhaustion. There is an active effect available for each level of exhaustion.

Exhaustion 1.name: Exhaustion 1
Exhaustion 1.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Exhaustion 2.name: Exhaustion 2
Exhaustion 2.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Exhaustion 3.name: Exhaustion 3
Exhaustion 3.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Exhaustion 4.name: Exhaustion 4
Exhaustion 4.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Exhaustion 5.name: Exhaustion 5
Exhaustion 5.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Exhaustion Dead.name: Exhaustion Dead
Exhaustion Dead.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Lordly Presence.name: Lordly Presence
Lordly Presence.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]] that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target suffers one of the following effects:

Captivated (Forager Only). The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Fearful (Hunter Only). The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Mired (Sage Only). The target takes [[/damage average activity=hYhryWdKIuHOzmO3]] damage, and the target is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn. While bewildered, the target subtracts [[/r 1d4]] from its saving throws.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: Charmed & Incapacitated
Charmed & Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Bewildered.name: Bewildered
Bewildered.description: The target is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn. While bewildered, the target subtracts [[/r 1d4]] from its saving throws.

Lunge.name: Lunge
Lunge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Dread Blade attack.

Luring Song.name: Luring Song
Luring Song.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical melody, which lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Concentration ends on it.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]], each [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when the song starts.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and ignores the Luring Song of other harpies.

If the target is more than 5 feet from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target moves on its turn toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. It doesn’t avoid &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]; however, before moving into damaging terrain (such as lava or a pit) and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target repeats the save.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Luring Song for 24 hours.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: Charmed & Incapacitated
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns.

While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Magic of the Spider Queen.name: Magic of the Spider Queen
Magic of the Spider Queen.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWeb0000000]{Web}, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]).

Magic Resistance.name: Magic Resistance
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Magic Rope.name: Magic Rope
Magic Rope.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magic rope. While bearing it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use the Entangling Rope action. The rope has AC 20, HP 90, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The rope turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points, if it is 5+ feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour or more, or if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. If the rope is damaged or destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fully restore it when finishing a Short or Long Rest.

Magical Backlash.name: Magical Backlash
Magical Backlash.description:
Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals damage to it.

Response—Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]], the triggering [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Save.name: Save
Save.condition: A creature within 120 feet of the cockatrice deals damage to it.

Majestic Song.name: Majestic Song
Majestic Song.description:

Misty Escape.name: 雾遁
Misty Escape.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can’t use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can’t return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

Mucus Cloud.description:
While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by mucus.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn. Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target’s skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can’t regain Hit Points unless it is underwater.

While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=JrxCVyCOsBAMVZS7]] damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

Damage: Outside Water.chatFlavor: Damage: Every 10 min. unless skin is wet.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description: While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes [[/damage 1d12 Acid average]] damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

Multiple Heads.name: Multiple Heads
Multiple Heads.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has five heads. Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 20 Hit Points when it grows new heads.

Mutating Claw.name: Mutating Claw
Mutating Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a slaad, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zy66rXdo6Mo4E9bO]]. Failure: The target is cursed. The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

If the curse reduces the target’s Hit Point maximum to 0, the curse ends, and instead of dying, the target instantly transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmRedSlaad000000]{Red Slaad} or, if it can cast spells of level 3 or higher, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGreenSlaad0000]{Green Slaad}. Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell can reverse this transformation.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description:
On failing a Constitution save, the target is cursed.

The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

[[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=TLqcxF6OYH0LweRo]]. Nightmare Haunting.name: Nightmare Haunting
Nightmare Haunting.description:
While on the Ethereal Plane, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve as the spell’s messenger, and the target must be a [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]]. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good} spell or within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle} spell.

If the target takes damage from the Dream spell, the target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to that damage. If the spell kills the target, its soul is trapped in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s soul bag, and the target can’t be raised from the dead until its soul is released.

Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have &Reference[Total Cover], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures inside itself at a time.

As an action, a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature or an object out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by succeeding on a [[/check dc=12 ability=str skill=ath format=long]], and the puller takes [[/damage average activity=PMCvyqxfUYiPzNK8]] damage.

体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]] 尺锥状区域内的每名生物。

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and [[lookup @range.special activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]]

Each time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters a creature’s space for the first time during this move, that target is subjected to the following effect.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space and has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]); if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] already has a creature Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition instead.

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing no extra movement.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC).

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition.

Prone & Restrained.description:
If the target is already Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition instead.

Smother.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can give it the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns. [[lookup @name lowercase]] rug can smother only one creature at a time.

While grappling the target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.
